rationale: The segment contains a vivid verb ('devastated'), but not an intensifier/comparative + risk-adjective.
statement_text: A global outbreak of the H5N1 subtype of HPAI has killed millions of wild birds and thousands of mammals on six continents, and devastated commercial bird populations.
A global outbreak of the H5N1 subtype of HPAI has killed millions of wild birds and thousands of mammals on six continents, and devastated commercial bird populations.
